info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rabun, southeastern Macon, south central Jackson and north central Oconee Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Walhalla, or 5 miles southeast of Highlands. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Highlands, Lake Jocassee, Pine Mountain, Whiteside Mountain and Bad Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
